text:
China International Industry Fair 2015 to focus on intelligent manufacturing Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
Sep 10, 2015 eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
SHANGHAI, China - With 16 years experience of marketing-oriented operation, China International Industry Fair (CIIF), an UFI approved event, has become the leading brand trade show of China's manufacturing equipment industry. The event has been an important vehicles and cooperative platform between China's Industrial insides and global magnates. CIIF 2014, completed on November 8, 2014, it attracted 2,101 exhibitors from 27 countries and 141,315 visitors from 83 countries or regions. 
As the giant professional manufacturing expo in China, CIIF will be held from 3-7 November, 2015. This year the exhibition venue has moved to the National Exhibition and Convention Center (Shanghai). It is the largest single block building and exhibition complex in the world and enjoys convenient transportation service. These offer CIIF the opportunity to enlarge its exhibition scale to exceed 220,000 square meters of exhibition space with growing demand from the manufacturing industry. The expanded venue will accommodate the substantial development and an extraordinary increase of 18 percent from 2014, with the 2015 event expected to attract up to 2,200 exhibitors worldwide. 
The 17th edition of CIIF will host 9 leading international trade shows, all taking place under a same theme of focusing on intelligent manufacturing. Each exhibition hall has been given a clear product focus in the area of high-grade digital metalworking & CNC machine tools, robotics, environmental protection, industrial automation, IT, new energy, auto and aerospace. 
Many manufacturing industries are feeling the pressure from rising cost of labor and land to the serious issues of industrial energy consumption and pollution. According to the strategic planning of China manufacturing 2025 released by China's State Council, 46 pilot projects will demonstrate the effectiveness of CIIF and intelligent manufacturing will continue to be the principal focus of the Chinese government. 
To promote the technological innovation, more than 50 forums and conventions will be held in conjunction with CIIF 2015, including a focus on new and emerging market segments with the aim of establishing the ideal platform for business contacts and knowledge exchange. 
The new launch of a LinkedIn profile as a marketing campaign has provided a channel for CIIF 2015 to share the latest news with the manufacturing industry and potential professional buyers.
